module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *13.0.34.10* Fixing FREEPBX-17647 Adding confirmation popup to deleting queue *13.0.34.9* FREEPBX-15383 Page setting display line number shown lost after submit *13.0.34.8* Require proper framework version *13.0.34.7* FREEPBX-15347 Check either/or *13.0.34.6* FREEPBX-16064 Queue reports hold time to agents in the wrong language *13.0.34.5* FREEPBX-15460 Playback Queue Caller Count feature code not working *13.0.34.4* FREEPBX-15347 unit tests *13.0.34.3* FREEPBX-15347 *13.0.34.2* FREEPBX-15350 always write out database hints *13.0.34.1* FREEPBX-15058 *13.0.34* FREEPBX-14938 Spelling issue in queue tool tips for join/leave empty *13.0.33* FREEPBX-12690 Restore usage info *13.0.32.9* FREEPBX-14132 Pause hint "all queues" action not correct *13.0.32.8* FREEPBX-14132 Pause hints for queues not updating BLF *13.0.32.7* FREEPBX-13529 Fix Stats reset on Queue Creation *13.0.32.6* FREEPBX-14133: queue ring volume override written out incorrectly *13.0.32.5* Replace absolute urls with relative urls in the grid *13.0.32.4* FREEPBX-13818 Force ring volume to be inherited *13.0.32.3* FREEPBX-12966 Errors in Queue pause dialplan *13.0.32.2* Fix buggy hints logic *13.0.32.1* FREEPBX-13241 Queue reset stats cron tasks not being created properly *13.0.32* FREEPBX-13364 Ability to set ringer volume *13.0.31* FREEPBX-12966 Errors in Queue pause dialplan *13.0.30* FREEPBX-12906 *13.0.29* Fix adding of call queues with modern databases (FreePBX-12845) by lidl *13.0.28* FREEPBX-12592, FREEPBX-12754 *13.0.27* More checks for recording file FREEPBX-11525 Add dialstatus check *13.0.19* FREEPBX-11505 *47 (Play the caller count) doesnt work *13.0.18* FREEPBX-11238 Fix Q* logon and logoff *13.0.17* FREEPBX-11248 FREEPBX-11233 *13.0.16*
